TopicTitle: This suddenly makes me want wildlife in KSP

Articles.Content:
The latest Space-X Grasshopper rocket test had a little bit of unexpected comedy relief.

http://www.space.com/22712-stampede-spacex-s-grasshopper-startles-cows-video.html

I think it would be pretty hilarious to have some herds of animals in KSP for Jeb to annoy with some fly-by's and minor (major) explosions
I kind of just leave my unwanted Kerbals on the Launchpad when I put a sort of unmanned vehicle up and it still puts them in it.
I really don't know why, but that video made me feel happy.
I envision minecraft cow herds around KSC
